title: Musk's SpaceX Said to Weigh Tie-Up With Tesla or xAI
title_zh: 马斯克旗下 SpaceX 据称正在权衡与特斯拉或 xAI 的合作
summary: SpaceX is said to be considering a potential merger with Tesla or xAI, as Elon Musk weighs how to consolidate his empire. Bloomberg Tech's Ed Ludlow discusses what's at stake on "Bloomberg: The Asia Trade."
summary_zh: 据说 SpaceX 正在考虑与特斯拉或 xAI 合并，埃隆·马斯克正在权衡如何巩固他的帝国。彭博科技公司的埃德·勒德洛 (Ed Ludlow) 在“彭博社：亚洲贸易”中讨论了利害攸关的问题。

title: Apple sees surging March revenue with strong iPhone demand in Asia
title_zh: 苹果预计 3 月份营收将大幅增长，亚洲 iPhone 需求强劲
summary: STORY: Apple forecast a surge in revenue for the start of the year, thanks to strong demand for its iPhones and its China business bouncing back.On Thursday, it estimated an up to 16% leap for January to March, well ahead of Wall Street's expectations.That came after a strong ...
summary_zh: 故事：由于 iPhone 需求强劲以及中国业务反弹，苹果公司预计今年年初收入将大幅增长。周四，该公司预计 1 月至 3 月收入将增长 16%，远远超出华尔街的预期。

title: Amazon in Talks to Invest $50 Billion in OpenAI, Expand Ties
title_zh: 亚马逊正在洽谈向 OpenAI 投资 500 亿美元，扩大合作伙伴关系
summary: OpenAI is also weighing a deal in which Amazon would use the startup’s artificial intelligence models, which power the popular ChatGPT chatbot, in its products and platforms, the person said. Amazon’s employees could also access the model for their work.
summary_zh: 该人士表示，OpenAI 还在考虑一项交易，亚马逊将在其产品和平台中使用这家初创公司的人工智能模型，该模型为流行的 ChatGPT 聊天机器人提供支持。亚马逊的员工也可以访问该模型来进行工作。

title: Stock market today: Dow, S&P 500, Nasdaq futures slide as Trump's Fed pick, Apple earnings take focus
title_zh: 今日股市：道琼斯指数、标准普尔 500 指数、纳斯达克期货因特朗普的美联储选择而下滑，苹果公司的盈利成为焦点
summary: Major gauges are set to end the week higher with earnings and the Fed holding investor attention.
summary_zh: 随着企业财报和美联储吸引投资者的注意力，主要指标预计本周将走高。

title: S&P 500, Nasdaq slip as Big Tech ramps up AI spending
title_zh: 随着大型科技公司加大人工智能支出，标准普尔 500 指数和纳斯达克指数下滑
summary: STORY: Stocks finished mixed Thursday with the Dow posting a small gain, the S&P 500 falling fractionally and the Nasdaq losing seven-tenths of one percent.Investors were rattled by the latest earnings reports and worried about whether hefty spending on artificial intelligence...
summary_zh: 故事：周四股市收盘涨跌互现，道琼斯指数小幅上涨，标准普尔 500 指数小幅下跌，纳斯达克指数下跌十分之七百分之一。投资者对最新的收益报告感到不安，并担心在人工智能方面的巨额支出是否......

title: Earnings live: Sandisk stock surges on huge profit beat, Deckers stock soars, Apple earnings beat estimates
title_zh: 财报直播：Sandisk 股价因利润大幅上涨而飙升，Deckers 股价飙升，苹果盈利超出预期
summary: The fourth quarter earnings season kicks into high gear this week, with Big Tech results from Microsoft, Meta, Tesla, and Apple headlining the earnings calendar.
summary_zh: 第四季度财报季本周进入高潮，微软、Meta、特斯拉和苹果等大型科技公司的业绩成为财报日历的头条新闻。

title: Amazon to reportedly invest up to $50B in OpenAI: WSJ
title_zh: 据《华尔街日报》报道，亚马逊将向 OpenAI 投资高达 500 亿美元
summary: Amazon (AMZN) is reportedly in talks to invest in OpenAI (OPAI.PVT), according to the Wall Street Journal.Market Domination Overtime host Josh Lipton outlines the details.To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination O...
summary_zh: 据《华尔街日报》报道，亚马逊 (AMZN) 正在洽谈投资 OpenAI (OPAI.PVT)。Market Domination Overtime 主持人 Josh Lipton 概述了详细信息。要观看有关最新市场行动的更多专家见解和分析，请查看更多 Market Domi...

title: Apple tops Q1 earnings estimates on record-breaking iPhone sales
title_zh: iPhone 销量破纪录 苹果第一季度盈利预期超预期
summary: Apple reported its first quarter earnings after the bell Thursday.
summary_zh: 苹果公司周四盘后公布了第一季度财报。

title: Stock market today: S&P 500, Nasdaq fall as Microsoft leads tech lower with Apple earnings on deck
title_zh: 今日股市：标普 500 指数和纳斯达克指数下跌，因微软引领科技股走低，苹果财报公布
summary: Wall Street is in the middle of Big Tech earnings, with Apple the next 'Magnificent Seven' member set to report.
summary_zh: 华尔街正处于大型科技公司财报的中期，苹果公司将成为下一个“七巨头”的成员。
